metadata.description: How easily conversation flows and how well you understand each other

astrological_basis.what_it_measures: Mercury aspects show mental wavelength. Jupiter adds openness and humor. Uranus brings unique perspectives.

planet_meanings.Mercury: thinking style and how you express ideas

very_low.label: Static
very_low.guidance: Messages often get lost; keep conversations simple.

low.label: Choppy
low.guidance: Takes effort; check in to make sure you're on same page.

mid.label: Workable
mid.guidance: Can communicate fine with some patience.

high.label: Easy
high.guidance: Conversations flow naturally; you understand each other's style.

very_high.label: Effortless
very_high.guidance: Talk for hours without trying; great banter and real talk.
